channel.title: Berenice Bejo on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Berenice Bejo on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Bérénice Bejo to Star as First Female Director Alice Guy Blaché in HBO Max, France Télévisions Drama
item.description: ‘Alice’ follows “the remarkable journey of a visionary artist who defied conventions and expectations as a filmmaker, entrepreneur, wife, and mother.”
